about_me.des: I am a Android Application Development Engineer at present,And I was a Android Source Development Engineer as I worked for a IDH(Independent Design House) company two years ago. I think life is a process of learning and serving, not only on the materials, but also on the spiritual aspect. there tree things deep inside me: Faith, Love, Hope. Faith is the source where confidence comes, and love is the instrument overcome difficulties and obstacles, live with hope, I would not hesitate go forward!

projects.saplatform: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It has comprehensive function, it can be easily used and edited. It's adapted for many kinds devices.
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
projects.rsser: Rsser is an Ionic application, with this application we can read news and articles freely, you can add rss address from the given list and add it manually.

career.huadong_des: Now I am in HuaDong Media,take the position of senior engineerï¼Œand the responsibility for development of application which has more than one million DAU.
career.sand_des: In Sand, I was responsibility for development of application which helps feild staffs to fulfill their tasks, kind of management software.
career.dewav_des: In Dewav, which is a well known IDH company, I started to deal with android source code.
career.college_des: At July 2012,I graduated from college and started my Android technology tour.
